name: Oops!!! I Slept With Your Mom
name_original: Oops!!! I Slept With Your Mom
description:
Oops!!! I Slept With Your Mom:
A small indie title in which you must avoid obstacles and fight against enemies in order to reunite a baby with its mommy. It 's a pretty simple game which starts fairly easy and gets harder as you progress through the levels. Be it for wasting a little time or score chasing, mommies are waiting for you!Features
  • 9 unlockable characters, all with their own special ability!
  • Original hand drawn graphics.
  • Original retro sound track.
  • Randomized levels and enemies.

Cover Art by Erenyan Art (@erenyanart) https://www.instagram.com/erenyanart/
